name: Question about parry and two weapon fighting
author: UselessPoint

posts.author: UselessPoint
posts.content:
Hello to everyone, 
I'd like to ask another question. Since you can parry a number of attack per round equal to the number of attacks you've got (with the exception of the flurry rule), what if you got two weapon fighting? will you have then the chance to parry more attacks?

Thanks for any answer!

p.s: I know parry is broken and useless, but still wanted to know this.

posts.author: hunearo
posts.content:
As long as you got one more flurry from using a second weapon, you got one more parry chance. For example on lvl1 you can parry only one attack with a single weapon, and two attacks with two weapons. However if you already have three flurries with a single weapon (for example you have 11 pre-epic BAB) you will not gain another parry chance when fighting with two weapons.

However I also have a question about parry. Is it possible to tweak the game somehow, so the parry skill works as it was intended?

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:

However I also have a question about parry. Is it possible to tweak the game somehow, so the parry skill works as it was intended?
